description:
In a chat application, certain words need to be filtered out to maintain decorum.

Write a function to replace blacklisted words in a string with asterisks.

Sample Input: Message: "This is a bad word.", Blacklist: ["bad"]
Sample Output: "This is a *** word."

Explanation:

The word "bad" is replaced with "*".

Constraints:

sentence.length <= 1000

blacklist.size <= 100

Each word in blacklist has length <= 50

Words in blacklist are case-sensitive
sentence and blacklist consist of printable ASCII characters and spaces
title: Chat Application Filter

code_skeletons.skeleton_define_class:
class WordReplacer {
    public static String replaceWordsWithAsterisks(String sentence, List<String> blacklist) {
